about_the_game:
That special time of the year! Customize your truck and some of the trailers with a choice of Christmas paint jobs!

Paint schemes included:

  • X for Xmas
  • Deeply Frozen
  • Santa Driver
  • Red Freighter
  • Santa's Sled

All of these themes are applicable to any in-game truck. Three of these paint jobs (Deeply Frozen, Red Freighter, Santa Driver) are also applicable to some of the ownable trailers too.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
